title: REALLY NEED HELP, PLEASE COMMENT
body: lEAGUE KEEPS CRASHING AFTER CHAMP SELECT

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.
Yes, Tried repairing tried everything i've come across, riot released something in the oce launch screen explaining it happening to people in this patch

Hey there,

Is this issue still ongoing?
Hey, after riot made the wee lil update it was working for a day or two and now it keeps crashing again
Have you tried repairing since the hotfix was applied?

Are you running the game as Administrator?

Launching the client from the patcher and not your taskbar?
